review: A down to earth person who understands value of time with no visible signs of ego. Understands patients concerns very well. Although it was my first appointment with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Openness and frankness .. 
Suggested the best possible treatment option and then left you to decide 
Liked the doctors approach

My knee got fractured in an accident in Jan. 2019. Now I am facing stiff knee problem for the last1 year for this purpose I went BLK for consultation from Dr. Deepak Chaudhary (orthopedic surgeon). 
Although he is an experienced doctor but I am not satisfied with his consultation. I find him arrogant and his attitude towards patients is not good. He is least concerned towards his patients *** ** ******* ***** **** *** ***** ******
I'll strictly not recommend anyone to visit him for consultation.
He is not listening properly. His behavior towards patient is not good.  He didn't want explain about your treatment properly. Just said "you have to be operate or surgery.

NOT RECOMMENDED !!!!!
I consulted for ankle injury & I went BLK for consultation from Dr. Deepak Chaudhary (orthopaedic surgeon).

I went to him for an ACL surgery.  I had to get operated again after my ACL surgery as there was some infection. He shows very less concern for the patient and is arrogant. He is apathetic and will rush you to get operated. *** ****** ** *** ** ** ***** *** ********* ******* ** ** *** *** *** ******* *** ******* ** ******* ************
